EmailTemplate.description: In USE This email is sent to Award Owner to review an accepted award
EmailTemplate.name: Accepted Award Review
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Award__c.Name} is accepted.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Award__c.CreatedBy}, This email is to notify you that, the Award # {!Award__c.AwardNumber__c}, {!Award__c.Name}, has been accepted by {!Award__c.GranteeOrganization__c} and can be activated.
Kindly login to the UtahGrants Systems and start reviewing the Award details.
Sincerely,
UtahGrants Support Team
